get.description: Collection endpoint for the openapi_test_entity_type--openapi_test_entity_type resource type. Collections are a list of resource objects for a particular resource type. In the JSON API module for Drupal all collections are homogeneous, which means that all the items in a collection are of the same type.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The JSON:API module has some of the most robust and feature-rich filtering features around. All of that power comes with a bit of a learning curve though. Learn more in the documentation.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The JSON:API module allows you to sort collections based on properties in the resource or in nested resources. Learn more in the documentation.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination can be a deceptively complex topic. It's easy to fall into traps and not follow best-practices. Learn more in the documentation.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Embed related entities in the response. For example: use a query string like ?include=comments.author to include all the entities referenced by comments and all the entities referenced by author on those entities!. Learn more in the documentation.

get.description: Individual endpoint for the openapi_test_entity_type--openapi_test_entity_type resource type. The individual endpoint contains a resource object with the data for a particular resource or entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The uuid of the openapi_test_entity_type openapi_test_entity_type
